with tab as ( SELECT top(99999999999999) outtable.prod_alias, outtable.PROD_PRICE, outtable.a, outtable.aOutlet, outtable.b, outtable.bOutlet FROM ( SELECT mp.prod_alias, mp.PROD_PRICE/mp.PROD_CONTENT/mp.PROD_MIN_CONTENT as PROD_PRICE, mp.SORT
--,CASE WHEN dds.PROD_PRICE>=(ddp.PROD_PRICE+ddp.PROD_PRICE*0.03) THEN dds.PROD_PRICE END 'a' --,CASE WHEN dds.PROD_PRICE>=(ddp.PROD_PRICE+ddp.PROD_PRICE*0.03) THEN dds.STORE_NAME ELSE '' END 'aOutlet' --,CASE WHEN dds.PROD_PRICE<=(ddp.PROD_PRICE-ddp.PROD_PRICE*0.03) THEN dds.PROD_PRICE END 'b' --,CASE WHEN dds.PROD_PRICE<=(ddp.PROD_PRICE-ddp.PROD_PRICE*0.03) THEN dds.STORE_NAME ELSE '' END 'bOutlet'
--,CASE WHEN (dds.PROD_PRICE-(mp.PROD_PRICE*dds.PROD_QUANTITY))/(mp.PROD_PRICE*dds.PROD_QUANTITY) >= 0.03 THEN dds.PROD_PRICE END 'a' --,CASE WHEN (dds.PROD_PRICE-(mp.PROD_PRICE*dds.PROD_QUANTITY))/(mp.PROD_PRICE*dds.PROD_QUANTITY) >= 0.03 THEN dds.STORE_NAME END 'aOutlet' --,CASE WHEN (dds.PROD_PRICE-(mp.PROD_PRICE*dds.PROD_QUANTITY))/(mp.PROD_PRICE*dds.PROD_QUANTITY) <= 0.03 THEN dds.PROD_PRICE END 'b' --,CASE WHEN (dds.PROD_PRICE-(mp.PROD_PRICE*dds.PROD_QUANTITY))/(mp.PROD_PRICE*dds.PROD_QUANTITY) <= 0.03 THEN dds.STORE_NAME END 'bOutlet'
--,CASE WHEN dds.PROD_PRICE>=((mp.PROD_PRICE*dds.PROD_QUANTITY)+(mp.PROD_PRICE*dds.PROD_QUANTITY)*0.03) THEN dds.PROD_PRICE END 'a' --,CASE WHEN dds.PROD_PRICE>=((mp.PROD_PRICE*dds.PROD_QUANTITY)+(mp.PROD_PRICE*dds.PROD_QUANTITY)*0.03) THEN dds.STORE_NAME ELSE '' END 'aOutlet' --,CASE WHEN dds.PROD_PRICE<=((mp.PROD_PRICE*dds.PROD_QUANTITY)-(mp.PROD_PRICE*dds.PROD_QUANTITY)*0.03) THEN dds.PROD_PRICE END 'b' --,CASE WHEN dds.PROD_PRICE<=((mp.PROD_PRICE*dds.PROD_QUANTITY)-(mp.PROD_PRICE*dds.PROD_QUANTITY)*0.03) THEN dds.STORE_NAME ELSE '' END 'bOutlet'
--,CASE WHEN (dds.PROD_PRICE-mp.PROD_PRICE)/(mp.PROD_PRICE) >= 0.03 THEN dds.PROD_PRICE END 'a' --,CASE WHEN (dds.PROD_PRICE-mp.PROD_PRICE)/(mp.PROD_PRICE) >= 0.03 THEN dds.STORE_NAME END 'aOutlet' --,CASE WHEN (dds.PROD_PRICE-mp.PROD_PRICE)/(mp.PROD_PRICE) <= 0.03 THEN dds.PROD_PRICE END 'b' --,CASE WHEN (dds.PROD_PRICE-mp.PROD_PRICE)/(mp.PROD_PRICE) <= 0.03 THEN dds.STORE_NAME END 'bOutlet'
,CASE WHEN ((dds.PROD_PRICE/dbo.fn_getUnitConvRate(dpm.TARGET_UNIT_ID,mp.PROD_BASEUNIT_ID,mp.PROD_CODE))-(mp.PROD_PRICE/mp.PROD_CONTENT/mp.PROD_MIN_CONTENT))/(mp.PROD_PRICE/mp.PROD_CONTENT/mp.PROD_MIN_CONTENT) >= 0.03 THEN (dds.PROD_PRICE/dbo.fn_getUnitConvRate(dpm.TARGET_UNIT_ID,mp.PROD_BASEUNIT_ID,mp.PROD_CODE)) END 'a' ,CASE WHEN ((dds.PROD_PRICE/dbo.fn_getUnitConvRate(dpm.TARGET_UNIT_ID,mp.PROD_BASEUNIT_ID,mp.PROD_CODE))-(mp.PROD_PRICE/mp.PROD_CONTENT/mp.PROD_MIN_CONTENT))/(mp.PROD_PRICE/mp.PROD_CONTENT/mp.PROD_MIN_CONTENT) >= 0.03 THEN ms.STORE_NAME END 'aOutlet' ,CASE WHEN ((dds.PROD_PRICE/dbo.fn_getUnitConvRate(dpm.TARGET_UNIT_ID,mp.PROD_BASEUNIT_ID,mp.PROD_CODE))-(mp.PROD_PRICE/mp.PROD_CONTENT/mp.PROD_MIN_CONTENT))/(mp.PROD_PRICE/mp.PROD_CONTENT/mp.PROD_MIN_CONTENT) <= 0.03 THEN (dds.PROD_PRICE/dbo.fn_getUnitConvRate(dpm.TARGET_UNIT_ID,mp.PROD_BASEUNIT_ID,mp.PROD_CODE)) END 'b' ,CASE WHEN ((dds.PROD_PRICE/dbo.fn_getUnitConvRate(dpm.TARGET_UNIT_ID,mp.PROD_BASEUNIT_ID,mp.PROD_CODE))-(mp.PROD_PRICE/mp.PROD_CONTENT/mp.PROD_MIN_CONTENT))/(mp.PROD_PRICE/mp.PROD_CONTENT/mp.PROD_MIN_CONTENT) <= 0.03 THEN ms.STORE_NAME END 'bOutlet'
FROM DMS_DATA_SALE dds INNER JOIN DMS_CLIENT dc ON dds.CLIENT_ID=dc.CLIENT_ID --产品 INNER JOIN DMS_PROD_MAPPING dpm ON dpm.CLIENT_ID=dc.CLIENT_ID AND dpm.DIST_PROD_CODE=dds.PROD_CODE and dpm.DIST_PROD_UNIT=dds.PROD_UNIT AND dds.PROD_NAME=dpm.DIST_PROD_NAME INNER JOIN MDM_PRODUCT mp ON mp.PROD_CODE= dpm.TARGET_PROD_CODE --AND mp.PROD_PRICEUNIT_ID=dpm.TARGET_UNIT_ID --门店 INNER JOIN DMS_STORE_MAPPING dsm ON dsm.CLIENT_ID=dds.CLIENT_ID AND dsm.DIST_STORE_CODE=dds.STORE_CODE INNER JOIN MDM_STORE ms ON ms.STORE_CODE= dsm.TARGET_STORE_CODE INNER JOIN MDM_DISTRIBUTOR md ON md.DIST_ID = dc.DIST_ID AND ms.DIST_ID=md.DIST_ID LEFT JOIN BASE_ORG bo ON bo.ORG_ID=md.ORG_ID
WHERE dds.state='1' $distId$ $startdate$ $enddate$ $skuName$ $orgId$ $simsOrgId$ $orgSubCode$ and mp.PROD_CODE not in ('zengpin','qita','tingchan') )AS outtable
WHERE outtable.aOutlet!='' or outtable.bOutlet!='' GROUP BY outtable.prod_alias, outtable.PROD_PRICE, outtable.a, outtable.aOutlet, outtable.b, outtable.bOutlet, outtable.SORT
) select * from tab
